name: Laser Slicer
description:
Laser Slicer, the fun idle slicing game is here! Build ultimate slicing monster, upgrade the laser power, unlock slicing objects, and become the best Laser Slicer!

Slicing while idle - Keep cutting fruits to get coins
Accelerate slices- Add your own cut to speed up the cutting and slicing, earn more and faster!

Keep upgrading - endless gameplay and upgrades for you to keep maximize laser machines' slicing power!
